title: mRNA sequence determinants of protein production rate

author: Juraj Szavits Nossan, University of Edinburgh

segmentation: Thank you if you ever had to synthesize a protein in your lab, you probably may have heard of term codon optimization, and the idea is to make changes to the genetic code that would improve protein yields and accuracy.
In this talk I will talk about mathematical modeling of Messenger RNA translation in order to understand how the genetic code affects protein expression.
So the idea of codon optimization is based on the fact.
